alert.note: Alert for Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN HOCKING COUNTY THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1017 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Logan, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Logan, Hocking Hills State Park, South Bloomingville, Gibisonville, Ilesboro, Lake Logan State Park and Union Furnace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
